mapper.select: select g.group_id, g.title, g.discountPrice, g.currentpeople, g.status, g.filename from GROUPITEM g order by status desc, group_id desc
select i.item_id, i.title, i.price, i.item_date, i.confirm, i.filename from ITEM i order by i.confirm asc, i.item_id desc
SELECT a.auction_id, a.title, a.price, a.auctionPrice, a.start_date, a.end_date, a.status, a.filename from auction a order by a.status DESC, a.auction_id DESC
select g.group_id, g.title, g.discountPrice, g.currentpeople, g.status, g.filename from GROUPITEM g where seller_id = #{member_id} order by group_id desc
select i.item_id, i.title, i.price, i.item_date, i.confirm, i.filename from ITEM i where member_id = #{member_id} order by i.item_id desc
SELECT a.auction_id, a.title, a.status, a.filename from auction a where member_id = #{member_id} order by a.auction_id DESC

select rownum, 1 as transaction, item_id as id, title, price, filename from (select * from item order by item_id desc) where rownum <= 4 union all select rownum, 2 as transaction,group_id as id, title, discountprice as price, filename from (select * from groupitem order by group_id desc) where rownum <= 4 union all select rownum,3 as transaction, auction_id as id, title, price, filename from (select * from auction order by auction_id desc) where rownum <= 4
